variable.name: IDTYPE
variable.description: COHORT IDENTIFIER

variable.name: HEAR_S1
variable.description: DO YOU HAVE A HEARING PROBLEM NOW ?

variable.name: HEAR_S2
variable.description: IF YES (TO HEAR_S1), IN WHICH EAR:

variable.name: HEAR_S3
variable.description: IF YES (TO HEAR_S1), DID YOUR HEARING BEGIN...

variable.name: HEAR_S5
variable.description: HAVE YOU HAD EAR SURGERY ?

variable.name: HEAR_S6
variable.description: IF YES (TO HEAR_S5), IN WHICH EAR ?

variable.name: HEAR_S7
variable.description: HAVE YOU EVER WORN A HEARING AID ?

variable.name: HEAR_S8
variable.description: IF YES (HEAR_S7), IN WHICH EAR ?

variable.name: HEAR_S9
variable.description: ARE YOU STILL USING THE HEARING AID ?
variable.value: NO OR NEVER WORE A HEARING AID (HEAR_S7 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S10
variable.description: HOW MUCH EXPOSURE TO LOUD NOISE HAVE YOU HAD ?

variable.name: HEAR_S12
variable.description: HAVE YOU EVER SHOT GUNS ? IF NO, PLEASE GO TO QUESTION 6

variable.name: HEAR_S13
variable.description: IF YES TO (HEAR_S12), HAVE YOU EVER SHOT HANDGUN ?

variable.name: HEAR_S14
variable.description: IF YES (HEAR_S12), HAVE YOU EVER SHOT RIFLE ?

variable.name: HEAR_S15
variable.description: IF YES (HEAR_S12), HAVE YOU EVER SHOT SHOTGUN ?

variable.name: HEAR_S16
variable.description: DID YOU HUNT ?

variable.name: HEAR_S17
variable.description: DID YOU DO TARGET PRACTICE ?

variable.name: HEAR_S18
variable.description: IN MILITARY ?

variable.name: HEAR_S19
variable.description: DID YOU EVER WORK IN LOUD NOISE ?

variable.name: HEAR_S20
variable.description: IF YES, HOW MANY YEARS ?

variable.name: HEAR_S22
variable.description: DID YOU WEAR EAR PROTECTION AT WORK ?
variable.value: NO OR NEVER WORKED IN LOUD NOISE (HEAR_S19 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S23
variable.description: HOW MANY YEARS DID YOU WEAR EAR PROTECTION ?
variable.value: NEVER WORE EAR PROTECTION AT WORK (HEAR_S22 0) OR NEVER WORKED IN LOUD NOISE (HEAR_S19 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S24
variable.description: HAVE YOU RECEIVED MEDICINES THAT CAUSED HEARING LOSS ?

variable.name: HEAR_S26
variable.description: DO YOUR EARS MAKE NOISE (TINNITUS) ?

variable.name: HEAR_S27
variable.description: IF YES (TO HEAR_S26), DOES THE NOISE BOTHER YOU ?
variable.value: NO OR EARS DON'T MAKE NOISE (HEAR_S26 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S28
variable.description: IF YES (TO HEAR_S26), DOES THE NOISE KEEP YOU FROM SLEEPING ?
variable.value: NO OR EARS DON'T MAKE NOISE (HEAR_S26 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S29
variable.description: HAVE YOU HAD DIZZY SPELLS IN THE PAST YEAR ?

variable.name: HEAR_S30
variable.description: DO YOU HAVE A PROBLEM WITH YOUR BALANCE ?

variable.name: HEAR_S31
variable.description: ANY FAMILY MEMBERS WITH HEARING LOSS ?

variable.name: HEAR_S32
variable.description: DOES YOUR MOTHER HAVE HEARING LOSS ?
variable.value: NO OR NO FAMILY MEMBER HAS HEARING LOSS (HEAR_S31 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S33
variable.description: DOES YOUR FATHER HAVE HEARING LOSS ?
variable.value: NO OR NO FAMILY MEMBER HAS HEARING LOSS (HEAR_S31 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S34
variable.description: (10.C) DO YOUR BROTHERS HAVE HEARING LOSS ?
variable.value: NO OR NO FAMILY MEMBER HAS HEARING LOSS (HEAR_S31 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S35
variable.description: DO YOUR SISTERS HAVE HEARING LOSS ?
variable.value: NO OR NO FAMILY MEMBER HAS HEARING LOSS (HEAR_S31 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S36
variable.description: DO YOURS AUNTS HAVE HEARING LOSS ?
variable.value: NO OR NO FAMILY MEMBER HAS HEARING LOSS (HEAR_S31 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S37
variable.description: DO YOUR UNCLES HAVE HEARING LOSS ?
variable.value: NO OR NO FAMILY MEMBER HAS HEARING LOSS (HEAR_S31 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S38
variable.description: DO YOUR GRANDPARENTS HAVE HEARING LOSS ?
variable.value: NO OR NO FAMILY MEMBER HAS HEARING LOSS (HEAR_S31 0)

variable.name: HEAR_S39
variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM CAUSE YOU TO FEEL EMBARRASSED WHEN MEETING NEW PEOPLE ?

variable.name: HEAR_S40
variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM CAUSE YOU TO FEEL FRUSTRATED WHEN TALKING TO MEMBERS OF YOUR FAMILY ?

variable.name: HEAR_S41
variable.description: DO YOU HAVE DIFFICULTY HEARING WHEN SOMEONE SPEAKS IN A WHISPER ?

variable.name: HEAR_S42
variable.description: DO YOU FEEL HANDICAPPED BY A HEARING PROBLEM ?

variable.name: HEAR_S43
variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM CAUSE YOU DIFFICULTY WHEN VISITING FRIENDS, RELATIVE, OR NEIGHBORS ?

variable.name: HEAR_S44
variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM CAUSE YOU TO ATTEND RELIGIOUS SERVICES LESS OFTEN THAN YOU WOULD LIKE ?

variable.name: HEAR_S45
variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM CAUSE YOU TO HAVE ARGUMENTS WITH FAMILY MEMBERS ?

variable.name: HEAR_S46
variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM CAUSE YOU DIFFICULTY WHEN LISTENING TO TV OR RADIO ?

variable.name: HEAR_S47
variable.description: DO YOU FEEL THAT ANY DIFFICULTY WITH YOUR HEARING LIMITS OR HAMPERS YOUR PERSONAL OR SOCIAL LIFE ?

variable.name: HEAR_S48
variable.description: DOES A HEARING PROBLEM CAUSE YOU DIFFICULTY WHEN IN A RESTAURANT WITH RELATIVES OR FRIENDS ?

variable.name: HEAR_S49
variable.description: IF YES (HEAR_S12), HAVE YOU EVER SHOT ARTILLERY ?

variable.name: HEAR_S50
variable.description: IF YES (HEAR_S12), HOW MANY TOTAL ROUNDS ?

variable.name: HEAR_S11
variable.description: IF EXPOSED, WHAT WAS THE MAIN SOURCE OF THE NOISE ?

variable.name: HEAR_S25
variable.description: HAVE YOU RECEIVED MEDICINES THAT CAUSED HEARING LOSS? IF YES, NAME OF DRUG.

variable.name: examdate
variable.description: DATE OF FILLING QUESTIONNAIRE, NUMBER OF DAYS FROM EXAM 1

variable.name: hear_s4
variable.description: IF YES (TO HEAR_S1), ABOUT WHEN DID IT BEGIN? NUMBER OF YEARS FROM YEAR OF EXAM 1

variable.name: shareid
variable.description: UNIQUE PARTICIPANT ID
